intro: Metrosideros ovata, commonly known as the New Zealand flame tree, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It is characterized by its striking red or orange flowers that bloom in clusters during the spring and summer months. The tree has smooth, reddish-brown bark and glossy, dark green leaves that are elliptical in shape. It is a fast-growing species that can reach heights of up to 15 meters, making it a popular ornamental plant. The plant is also known for its ability to thrive in a variety of soil types and climates.
